subject: Simsonn HS Pro Shifter release date
description_text:
Hello,
my name is Dmitry. I’m from Russia.
3 months ago I bought Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedals on our local
marketplace called Ozon. I bought it from official SIMSONN seller (the
seller has special mark/sign which confirms it’s official).
I’m pretty happy with these pedals; Pedals are amazing, thank you a lot!
Now on SIMSONN official website I can see “Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ
Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter” available for pre-sale. I fell in love
with it and really want to buy it.
I think there is no option for Russians to order anything via SIMSONN
official website, because there is no such an option for suitable payment
system. Turns out it is very convenient for us to buy Simsonn stuff via
Ozon marketplace.
So, I have a question: will Simsonn HS Pro Shifter be represented on Ozon
marketplace by any chance? If so, can you say approximate date of HS Pro
Shifter release on Ozon, please?

Best wishes,
Dmitry Sh

conversations.body_text: 你好，Dmitry Sh，Здравствуйте, товар поступит в продажу в этом месяце. Спасибо за внимание и поддержку.
